verses.name: Leviticus 13:17
verses.text: And the priest shall see him: and, behold, if the plague be turned into white; then the priest shall pronounce him clean that hath the plague: he is clean.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:18
verses.text: The flesh also, in which, even in the skin thereof, was a boil, and is healed,

verses.name: Leviticus 13:19
verses.text: And in the place of the boil there be a white rising, or a bright spot, white, and somewhat reddish, and it be shewed to the priest;
